archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0363
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to receive notifications via the App about my order, so I know what is happening with it. E.g. Order confirmation, order dispatch

properties.value: Order confirmation ok, order dispatch probably should be from courier? any other notifications about statuses should be sent? See REQ_BSS_0274

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
